mapper.sql: project_id, project_creater, description, endtime, project_followers, is_deleted, is_lock, plan_url, primary_job, project_name, starttime, project_status, project_type, video_url, project_people, main_people, project_teacher, project_need, project_match, project_cooperation, project_activity, project_service, project_finance, project_income, project_company, project_else_info, project_activiti_state, project_state_token, project_audit_msg, people_time, match_time, cooperation_time, activity_time, service_time, finance_time, income_time, company_time, else_info_time, project_people_new, is_going, follow_date, my_follow, update_time, supervisor_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PRO_PROJECT
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from PRO_PROJECT where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0

select
from PRO_PROJECT where project_id != #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_deleted = 0

select
from PRO_PROJECT where project_creater = #{projectCreater,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_deleted = 0

select
from PRO_PROJECT where project_state_token in
#{token}
and is_deleted = 0

select
from PRO_PROJECT where is_going is not null and is_deleted = 0 order by starttime desc
SELECT * FROM PRO_PROJECT ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3;
select f.follow_time,f.follower,p.* FROM PRO_FOLLOW f, PRO_PROJECT p WHERE f.project_id = p.project_id and f.follower = #{follower} and f.is_delete = 0
select m.join_date,m.member_name,m.member_phone,p.* FROM PRO_MEMBER m, PRO_PROJECT p WHERE m.project_id = p.project_id and m.member_phone = #{phone} and m.is_deleted = 0 and m.is_audit = 1

select DISTINCT pp.* from PRO_PROJECT pp INNER JOIN PRO_FOLLOW pf ON pp.project_id = pf.project_id WHERE pp.project_creater = #{projectCreater} and pp.is_deleted = 0 and pp.is_going is NOT NULL and pf.is_delete = 0
